## Packages

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
```

## Data Import

```{r}
claims <- read_csv("claims.csv")
claims
```

## Data Cleaning

```{r}
claims_clean <- claims %>%
 filter(DEPARTMENTID >= 6L & DEPARTMENTID <= 20L)
 

```

## Data Vizualization

```{r}
ggplot(claims_clean) +
  aes(x = DEPARTMENTID) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30L, fill = "#112446") +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}

dv1 <- ggplot(claims_clean) +
  aes(x = DEPARTMENTID) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30L, fill = "#112446") +
  theme_minimal()

ggplotly(dv1)

```
